attributes.action: resign and call and immediate election due to the governments inability to manage the economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Inflation is now at 4.4% and rising.  The Bank of England is set to raise interest rates yet again affecting millions of homeowners and businesses.  The government has now proven it is unable to effectively run this country and should now call a general election so that the UK's population can decide.
